preparation.title:
Eid
Preparation
preparation.description: Hello to the Eid that we've been waiting for a year.

happiness.title:
Eid
Happiness
happiness.description: We don't forget the incense and the Eid clothes that we've prepared, and we eagerly await the day to wear them.

aud.title: Headline here
aud.description: After getting dressed, it's time for the Takbeerat, and the Eid prayer, with its delightful atmosphere, We exchange greetings and well wishes, and then we hurry to join the family gathering.

family.title: Headline here
family.description: After the congratulations, comes the time when the children become wealthier than their parents. They collect their Eidiyah and compete to see who can collect the most.

greetingSection.title: Greeting Cards
greetingSection.para: To share with your loved ones!

rideSection.title: Headline here
rideSection.para: Now, let's move on to the time of the Eid lunch with the family, but we're missing some. Some have already fallen into the Eid coma, and the rest will catch up with them after lunch.

moneySection.title: Headline here
moneySection.para: After the Eid coma, the excitement renews and we start thinking about where to go and what to do. This is when the Eid activities come into play.
